data.text:
#hiring #c2c #benchsales #vendorlist #contract #onsite #dataanalyst #DataAnalyst #Philadelphia, PA ‚Äì #Onsite (#localcandidates ) #Contract Job Description: 1. Data Storytelling: ‚Ä¢ Drive the storytelling process by weaving insights from data visualizations into coherent narratives that support decision-making processes. ‚Ä¢ Craft compelling narratives based on industry best practices and Telecom guidelines. ‚Ä¢ Be a confident presenter capable of effective communication to executives. 2. Actionable Insights: ‚Ä¢ Leverage data to drive actionable insights and solutions for the business. 3. Data Extraction and Analysis ‚Ä¢ Utilize advanced SQL querying techniques to extract, clean, and analyze large datasets from various sources. ‚Ä¢ Design and create visually appealing and informative dashboards, graphs, and reports using visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar. 4. Communication and Functional Domain experience: ‚Ä¢ Understand Telecom business functions around Order Management based on past experience. ‚Ä¢ Present complex findings and insights to diverse stakeholders, including senior leadership, in a clear, concise, and compelling manner. #inboxme or #shareresume at simranjeet@tanishasystems.com Shilpa B.Himanshu AroraAkash SharmaAkash VermaNavneet Kumar ‚úÖBhawesh KaushikBhupendra ChauhanHarsh MauryaSatyesh Bharadwaj

#hiring #hiringimmediately #businessanalyst #usc #gc #tn #fulltime #usitjobs #onsite Business Analyst Location : Lewisville, TX, / Renton, WA Job Type : Fulltime (Onsite) Job Description:- Need to perform research and business analysis on Various types of Vehicle engineering related Data needs and write Business User Stories with identification of Data Contracts with internal cross functional Teams and any External Applications Teams and complete data assessment. Need to covert initial business analysis and articulate Business User Stories with proper input-conditions, personas from user and system perspective, User Story detailing with identification of business-benefit & related data justification, accurate-acceptance-criteria with definition-of-done Need to work with architect to find Project related architecture and align the Implementation User Stories, NFR's with Business User Stories to have accurate traceability. Need to analyse the Data Contracts Specifications with base data in JSON, KAFKA patterns, schema evaluation and find end-to-end User action Key Responsibilities and Duties: The Senior Business Analyst job is responsible for examining and identifying various sources data within the organization, authoring the business requirements. Understanding of connected Fleet Maintenance & Prognostics Perform Business stakeholder analysis and identify the Personas and work with cross Teams collaboratively within the organization while defining the business requirements. Responsible for assessing privacy and regulatory compliance requirements from an organization point of view and provide recommendations to address the gaps. Under limited supervision, the Senior Business Analyst job is responsible for collecting related data internal as external data sources and perform complete business analysis represent with score cards. Provides business process, system support, and data quality governance for EU & NA data through data coordination and integration to ensure efficient processes and consistent business data flows. Develops business reports and dashboards using appropriate tools (Tableau or Power BI) to identify key business metrics, trends, opportunities, and gaps. Optimizes dashboard reporting for operations and management to ensure data driven decision making and to tell the Service Assurance story. The Senior Business Analyst is responsible for defining the Business Requirements Specification and continuously improving the specification. 10+ years of experience in a business and data analysis role with automotive domain experience. 5 years of relevant work experience and have preferably worked in vehicle telematics and vehicle related business focused assignments. You are a self-driven, critical personality Hands-on experience with ETL tools and techniques (Desirable) Hands-on experience with dashboarding tools (Tableau, PowerBI), and techniques (Desirable) Thanks & Warm Regards, haripriya.pandhari@techdoquest.com

üîç Still Searching for Exciting Data Opportunities! üìà Hello LinkedIn community, I hope this message finds you well. I am actively seeking new career opportunities in Data Analysis and Data Engineering. My expertise in cloud technologies (AWS, GCP) and ETL processes enables me to deliver impactful solutions that enhance stakeholder satisfaction and project efficiency. In my previous roles, I've contributed to data integration, accuracy, and visualization efforts, supporting informed decision-making within organizations. I am passionate about staying updated on emerging data analytics trends through continuous learning, which I believe is crucial for driving organizational success in today's data-driven world. As my current project nears completion, I am proactively exploring new opportunities. I am particularly interested in Contract-to-Contract (C2C) or Contract-to-Hire (C2H) positions that offer both flexibility and the potential for long-term growth. If you are hiring for a Senior Data Engineer and find my skill set aligns with your client's needs, I would greatly appreciate hearing from you regarding relevant openings. I am confident in my ability to deliver exceptional results and add value to your organization. Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn or email me at meghanac279@gmail.com. I am excited to explore potential opportunities and contribute to your client's success. Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you soon! Best regards, Meghana 7206639006 #c2cjobs #c2c #c2h #hiring #datajobs #bigdata #recruiters #cloud #kafka #hadoop #aws #spark #hive #etl #s3 #snowflake #linux #python #sql #scala #azure #databricks #ssis #data #pipeline #activelylooking #dataengineering #jobhunt #newjob #jobinusa #connections #layoffs #hiring #opportunity #askmehow #engineering #help #share #c2chiring #c2crequirements #hiringalerts #snowflake #primevendors

Hello Professionals, Good Evening! Hope you are doing great. This is Karthick from Sight Spectrum, we have an Immediate Hiring for our Fortune Clients with Immediate Interview slots available Title: #DataEngineer with Strong #AWS #QuickSight Location - #Raleigh, NC - Day 1 Onsite Contract Long Term Experience: 12+ Years Must Client Expectation ‚Äì "I need more of an analytics person vs #ETL / data engineer with more experience presenting insights on #Dashboards and apps." Key skillset- Worked on #DataScience projects with sound analytical knowledge in providing business insights The resource should be able to perform data wrangling and transformation using #Python- and would need to be self-sustained to fix any bugs arising during the data transformation Experienced in creating Plotly dashboard with interactive application development knowledge with write back Experienced with hands on expertise in #AWS and #Databricks and should have worked on #DataLake and #DataWarehouse type of projects Having sound knowledge on creating and enhancing dashboards and reports using #QuickSight Share me the Resumes on karthickraja@sightspectrum.com #immediatejoiners #immediatehiring #immediate #c2crequirements #c2c #c2cvendors #c2cjobs #c2chotlist #c2cusajobs #c2crequirement #c2cavailable #c2crecruiters #c2chiring
